resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104854</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104854</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206892</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thank You, Mr. Edison: Electricity, Innovation, and Social Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Danke, Herr Edison: Elektrizität, 
Innovation und Sozialänderung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Merci, M. Edison : L'électricité, 
innovation, et changement social</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Obrigado, Sr. Edison: Eletricidade, 
inovação, e mudança social</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grazie, Il Sig. Edison: Elettricità, 
innovazione e cambiamento sociale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σας ευχαριστούμε, ο κ. Edison: Ηλεκτρική 
ενέργεια, καινοτομία, και κοινωνική αλλαγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gracias, Sr. Edison: Electricidad, 
innovación, y cambio social</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a lesson in which students learn about the invention of the phonograph, the impact of electricity on Americans, and Thomas Edison's role in the electrification of America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Lektion, in der Kursteilnehmer über die 
Erfindung des Plattenspielers, die Auswirkung von Elektrizität auf 
Amerikaner- und Thomasedisons Rolle in der Elektrisierung von Amerika 
erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une leçon dans laquelle les étudiants se 
renseignent sur l'invention du phonographe, l'impact de 
l'électricité sur le rôle d'Américains, et de Thomas Edison dans 
l'électrification de l'Amérique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma lição em que os estudantes aprendem sobre
a invenção do fonógrafo, o impacto da eletricidade no papel dos 
americanos, e do Thomas Edison no electrification de América.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una lezione in cui gli allievi imparano circa 
l'invenzione del fonografo, l'effetto di elettricità sul ruolo del 
Thomas e degli Americani Edison nell'elettrificazione dell'America.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα μάθημα στο οποίο οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν 
για την εφεύρεση του φωνογράφου, τον αντίκτυπο της ηλεκτρικής 
ενέργειας σε Αμερικανούς, και το ρόλο του Thomas Edison's 
στην ηλέκτριση της Αμερικής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una lección en la cual los estudiantes 
aprenden sobre la invención del fonógrafo, el impacto de la 
electricidad en papel de los americanos, y de Thomas Edison en la 
electrificación de América.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206892</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104854</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/thank-you-mr-edison-electricity-innovation-and-social-change</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
